Colleges and Universities across the Nation are Sponsoring EduMonk for their Students.


Student success starts with affording college. The Give EduMonk program enables colleges and universities to sponsor free access to EduMonk for their current and prospective students. Through Give EduMonk analytics, gain insights on key demographics winning scholarships to inspire prospective students, parents, and alumni. Students receive access to the mobile and desktop version of EduMonk branded with their school logo. EduMonk provides data analytics on the demographics of students winning scholarships; and schools share that impact with key stakeholders like Financial Aid, Admissions, and Alumni Relations.

Let us Know how you can help us !
